actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize ex gratia payment of compensation for work performed by certain prisoners of the German Government during World II who were wartime members of the Royal Army of Yugoslavia and who became U.S. citizens.

summary.text: Authorizes the payment of compensation for work performed by specified prisoners of the German Government during World War II who were wartime members of the Royal Army of Yugoslavia and who became United States citizens. Establishes the Yugoslav Claims Commission for determining the eligibility of individuals to receive compensation. Authorizes appropriations necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize ex gratia payment of compensation for work performed by certain prisoners of the German Government during World II who were wartime members of the Royal Army of Yugoslavia and who became U.S. citizens.
